context_bundle.summary: Dead Letter Queue pattern for handling failed message processing with retry logic, exponential backoff, and failure analysis

onboarding.quick_start: Move failed messages to dlq directory, implement separate retry process with exponential backoff, monitor DLQ size, analyze failure patterns
common_patterns: Move on failure: If processing fails, move message to dlq directory
Retry metadata: Add retryCount, lastRetry, errorMessage to DLQ messages
Exponential backoff: Retry delays grow exponentially (1s, 2s, 4s, 8s...)
Max retries: Abandon message after N attempts (default 3-5)
Monitoring: Alert when DLQ size exceeds threshold
known_errors: DLQ can grow unbounded without cleanup policy
Poison messages (always fail) need manual intervention
Retry order may differ from original order
